price: 92. Ya soló umma(1) na bino oyo ezali sé moko mpe ngai nde Nkolo wa bino bobondela nga.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُونِ
footnotes: 1 Umma: Elakisi: Lingomba, bótala lisusu na suratu Al-Baqarah na mokapo: 128.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhihi ummatukum ummatan wāḥidatan wa-anā rabbukum fa-uʿ'budūni
